snippet: Crown Maple Farm in Dutchess County has taken a new approach to maple syruping that does less damage to trees.
abstract: Crown Maple Farm in Dutchess County, NY, is taking a new approach to collecting maple syrup that does less damage to trees; instead of picturesque metal taps hung with buckets, the farm uses slender plastic taps that do less damage.
lead_paragraph: Crown Maple Farm in Dutchess County has taken a new approach to maple syruping that does less damage to trees.

headline.seo: Crown Maple Syrup From Dover Plains, N.Y.
headline.main: Syrup With a New York Accent
headline.print_headline: Syrup With a New York Accent
